QuestData.Title: Wrath of Odyn
QuestData.Description:
The horn has been forged and the worthy have been selected.
Now, $n, we have only to bind my chosen val'kyr to the horn and infuse them with my power that they may strike with my fury.
Come, bear witness.
QuestData.LogDescription: Bear witness to the empowerment of the chosen val'kyr and the binding of the Ilskahorn
QuestData.RewardText: It is done. Danica and her sisters are infused with my power and wield my wrath.
